Opcode.Description: Add rD = (rA) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: addx

Opcode.Description: Add Carrying (carry out) rD = (rA) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: addcx

Opcode.Description: Add Extended (carry-in-out) rD = (rA) + (rB) + XER[CA]
Opcode.Name: addex

Opcode.Description: Add Immediate rD = (rA|0) + EXTS(SIMM)
Opcode.Name: addi

Opcode.Description: Add Immediate Carrying rD = (rA) + EXTS(SIMM)
Opcode.Name: addic

Opcode.Description: Add Immediate Shifted rD = (rA|0) + (SIMM <<16)
Opcode.Name: addis

Opcode.Description: Add to Minus One Extended rD = (rA) + XER[CA] â€“ 1
Opcode.Name: addmex

Opcode.Description: Add to Zero Extended rD = (rA) + XER[CA]
Opcode.Name: addzex

Opcode.Description: And rA = (rS) & (rB)
Opcode.Name: andx

Opcode.Description: AND with Complement rA = (rS) & ~ (rB)
Opcode.Name: andcx

Opcode.Description: And Immediate rA = (rS) & (UIMM), CR0 set
Opcode.Name: andi

Opcode.Description: And Immediate Shifted rA = (rS) & ( UIMM <<16 )
Opcode.Name: andis
bx
bcx
bcctrx
bclrx

Opcode.Description: Compare (L=0) CR[crfD]=cmp(A,B)
Opcode.Name: cmp

Opcode.Description: Compare Immediate (L=0) CR[crfD]=cmp(A,SIMM)
Opcode.Name: cmpi

Opcode.Description: Compare Logical (L=0) CR[crfD]=cmp unsigned (A,B)
Opcode.Name: cmpl

Opcode.Description: Compare Logical Immediate (L=0) CR[crfD]=cmp unsigned (A,UIMM)
Opcode.Name: cmpli

Opcode.Description: Count Leading Zeros Word Returns 32 on 0 rA=leading_zeros(rS)
Opcode.Name: cntlzwx

Opcode.Description: Condition Register And CR[crbD] = CR[crbA] & CR[crbB]
Opcode.Name: crand

Opcode.Description: Condition Register And with Complement CR[crbD] = CR[crbA] & ~ CR[crbB]
Opcode.Name: crandc

Opcode.Description: Condition Register Equivalent CR[crbD] = CR[crbA] == CR[crbB]
Opcode.Name: creqv

Opcode.Description: Condition Register nand CR[crbD] = ~ (CR[crbA] & CR[crbB])
Opcode.Name: crnand

Opcode.Description: Condition Register nor CR[crbD] = ~ (CR[crbA] | CR[crbB])
Opcode.Name: crnor

Opcode.Description: Condition Register Or CR[crbD] = CR[crbA] | CR[crbB]
Opcode.Name: cror

Opcode.Description: Condition Register OR with Complement CR[crbD] = CR[crbA] | ~ CR[crbB]
Opcode.Name: crorc

Opcode.Description: Condition Register Xor CR[crbD] = CR[crbA] ^ CR[crbB]
Opcode.Name: crxor

Opcode.Description: Data Cache Block Flush EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: dcbf

Opcode.Description: Data Cache Block Invalidate EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: dcbi

Opcode.Description: Data Cache Block Store EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: dcbst

Opcode.Description: Data Cache Block Touch EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: dcbt

Opcode.Description: Data Cache Block Touch for Store EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: dcbtst

Opcode.Description: Data Cache Block Set to Zero Locked EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: dcbz_l

Opcode.Description: Data Cache Block Clear to Zero EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: dcbz

Opcode.Description: Divide Word rD = signed(rA) / signed(rB)
Opcode.Name: divwx

Opcode.Description: Divide Word Unsigned rD = unsigned(rA) / unsigned(rB)
Opcode.Name: divwux

Opcode.Description: External Control In Word Indexed EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: eciwx

Opcode.Description: External Control Out Word Indexed EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: ecowx

Opcode.Description: Enforce In-Order Execution of I/O
Opcode.Name: eieio

Opcode.Description: Equivalent rA = ~ ((rS) ^ (rB))
Opcode.Name: eqvx

Opcode.Description: Extend Sign Byte rA=(s8)rS
Opcode.Name: extsbx

Opcode.Description: Extend Sign Half Word rA=(s16)rS
Opcode.Name: extshx

Opcode.Description: Floating Absolute Value frD=fabs(frB)
Opcode.Name: fabsx

Opcode.Description: Floating Add (Double-Precision) frD = frA + frB
Opcode.Name: faddx

Opcode.Description: Floating Add Single if HID2[PSE] = 0 frD = frA + frB else frD(ps0) = frA(ps0) + frB(ps0) frD(ps1) = frD(ps0)
Opcode.Name: faddsx

Opcode.Description: Floating Compare Ordered CR[crfD]=CmpOrdered(A,B)
Opcode.Name: fcmpo

Opcode.Description: Floating Compare Unordered CR[crfD]=CmpUnordered(A,B)
Opcode.Name: fcmpu

Opcode.Description: Floating Convert to Integer Word frD=int_saturated(frB)
Opcode.Name: fctiwx

Opcode.Description: Floating Convert to Integer Word with Round toward Zero frD=int_saturated_zero(frB)
Opcode.Name: fctiwzx

Opcode.Description: Floaiting Divide (Double-Precision) frD=frA/frB
Opcode.Name: fdivx

Opcode.Description: Floating Divide Single frD=frA/frB
Opcode.Name: fdivsx

Opcode.Description: Floating Multiply-Add (Double-Precision) frD = (frA * frC) + frB
Opcode.Name: fmaddx

Opcode.Description: Floating Multiply-Add Single frD = (frA * frC) + frB
Opcode.Name: fmaddsx

Opcode.Description: Floating Move Register(Double-Precision) frD= frB
Opcode.Name: fmrx

Opcode.Description: Floating Multiply-Subtract (Double-Precision) frD = [frA * frC] - frB
Opcode.Name: fmsubx

Opcode.Description: Floating Multiply-Subtract Single frD = [frA * frC] - frB
Opcode.Name: fmsubsx

Opcode.Description: Floating Multiply (Double-Precision) frD = frA * frC
Opcode.Name: fmulx

Opcode.Description: frD = frA * frC
Opcode.Name: fmulsx

Opcode.Description: Floating Negative Absolute Value frD=-fabs(frB)
Opcode.Name: fnabsx

Opcode.Description: Floating Negate frD=-frB
Opcode.Name: fnegx

Opcode.Description: Floating Negative Multiply-Add (Double-Precision) frD = - ([frA * frC] + frB)
Opcode.Name: fnmaddx

Opcode.Description: Floating Negative Multiply-Add Single frD = -([frA * frC] + frB)
Opcode.Name: fnmaddsx

Opcode.Description: Floating Negative Multiply-Subtract (Double-Precision) frD = - ([frA * frC] - frB)
Opcode.Name: fnmsubx

Opcode.Description: Floating Negative Multiply-Subtract Single frD = - ([frA * frC] - frB)
Opcode.Name: fnmsubsx

Opcode.Description: Floating Reciprocal Estimate Single frD = estimate(1/frB)
Opcode.Name: fresx

Opcode.Description: Floating Round to Single frD=(f32)frB;
Opcode.Name: frspx

Opcode.Description: Floating Reciprocal Square Root Estimate frD=approx(1/sqrt(frB))
Opcode.Name: frsqrtex

Opcode.Description: Floating Select frD = frA>=0?frC:frB
Opcode.Name: fselx

Opcode.Description: Floating Subtract (Double-Precision) frD=frA-frB
Opcode.Name: fsubx

Opcode.Description: Floating Subtract Single frD=frA-frB
Opcode.Name: fsubsx

Opcode.Description: Instruction Cache Block Invalidate EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: icbi

Opcode.Description: Instruction Synchronize
Opcode.Name: isync

Opcode.Description: Load Byte and Zero EA is the sum (rA|0) + d
Opcode.Name: lbz

Opcode.Description: Load Byte and Zero Indexed EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: lbzx

Opcode.Description: Load Byte and Zero with Update (rA!=0,rD!=rA) EA is the sum (rA) + d rA=EA
Opcode.Name: lbzu

Opcode.Description: Load Byte and Zero with Update Indexed (rA!=0,rD!=rA) EA is the sum (rA) + (rB) rA=EA
Opcode.Name: lbzux

Opcode.Name: lfd

Opcode.Description: Load Floating-Point Single EA is the sum (rA|0) + d
Opcode.Name: lfs

Opcode.Description: Load Floating-Point Single Indexed EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: lfsx

Opcode.Description: Load Floating-Point Single with Update Indexed (rA!=0) EA = (rA) + (rB) rA = EA
Opcode.Name: lfsux

Opcode.Description: Load Floating-Point Single with Update (rA!=0) EA is the sum (rA) + d rA=EA
Opcode.Name: lfsu

Opcode.Name: lha

Opcode.Description: Load Half Word Algebraic Indexed EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)

Opcode.Description: Load Multiple Word EA is the sum (rA|0) + d
Opcode.Name: lmw

Opcode.Description: Load String Word Indexed EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: lswx

Opcode.Description: Load String Word Immediate EA is (rA|0)
Opcode.Name: lswi

Opcode.Description: Load Word and Reserve Indexed EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: lwarx

Opcode.Description: Load Word Byte-Reverse Indexed EA is the sum (rA|0) + rB
Opcode.Name: lwbrx

Opcode.Description: Load Word and Zero EA is the sum (rA|0) + d
Opcode.Name: lwz

Opcode.Description: Load Word and Zero Indexed EA is the sum (rA|0) + (rB)
Opcode.Name: lwzx

Opcode.Description: Load Word and Zero with Update (rA != 0, rA != rD) EA is the sum (rA) + d rA = EA
Opcode.Name: lwzu

Opcode.Description: Load Word and Zero with Update Indexed (rA != 0, rA != rD) EA is the sum (rA) + (rB) rA=EA

Opcode.Description: Move Condition Register Field CR[crfD] = CR[crfS]
Opcode.Name: mcrf

Opcode.Description: Move to Condition Register from FPSCR CR[crfD] = FPSCR[crfS]

Opcode.Name: mffsx

Opcode.Description: Move from Machine State Register rD = MSR
Opcode.Name: mfmsr

Opcode.Name: mfsr

Opcode.Description: Move from Segment Register Indirect rD = SEGREG(rB[0â€“3])
Opcode.Name: mfsrin

Opcode.Description: Move from Time Base rD = TBR[tbr]
Opcode.Name: mftb

Opcode.Description: Move to Condition Register Fields CR = rS & mask | CR &~mask
Opcode.Name: mtcrf

Opcode.Name: mtfsb0x

Opcode.Name: mtfsfx

Opcode.Name: mtfsfix

Opcode.Name: mtmsr

Opcode.Description: Move to Special-Purpose Register SPR[spr] = (rS)
Opcode.Name: mtspr

Opcode.Description: Move to Segment Register SEGREG(SR) = (rS)
Opcode.Name: mtsr

Opcode.Description: Move to Segment Register Indirect SEGREG(rB[0-3]) = (rS)
Opcode.Name: mtsrin

Opcode.Description: Multiply High Word prod[0-63] = rA * rB rD = prod[high bits]
Opcode.Name: mulhwx

Opcode.Description: Multiply High Word Unsigned prod[0â€“63] = (rA) * (rB) rD = prod[high bits]
Opcode.Name: mulhwux

Opcode.Description: Multiply Low Immediate prod[0â€“48] = (rA) * SIMM rD = prod[16-48]
Opcode.Name: mulli

Opcode.Description: Multiply Low Word prod[0â€“48] = (rA) * (rB) rD = prod[16-48]
Opcode.Name: mullwx

Opcode.Name: nandx

Opcode.Description: rD= ~ (rA) + 1
Opcode.Name: negx

Opcode.Name: norx

Opcode.Name: orx

Opcode.Name: orcx

Opcode.Description: Or Immediate rA = (rS) | UIMM
Opcode.Name: ori

Opcode.Description: OR Immediate Shifted rA = (rS) | UIMM<<16

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Absolute Value frD = fabs(frB)
Opcode.Name: ps_abs

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Add frD = frA+ frB
Opcode.Name: ps_add

Opcode.Description: Paired Singles Compare Ordered High CR[crfD]=cmpord(rfA,rfB)
Opcode.Name: ps_cmpo0

Opcode.Description: Paired Singles Compare Ordered Low CR[crfD]=cmpord(rfA,rfB)
Opcode.Name: ps_cmpo1

Opcode.Description: Paired Singles Compare Unordered High CR[crfD]=cmpun(rfA,rfB)
Opcode.Name: ps_cmpu0

Opcode.Description: Paired Singles Compare Unordered Low CR[crfD]=cmpun(rfA,rfB)
Opcode.Name: ps_cmpu1

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Divide frD(ps*) = frA(ps*) / frB(ps*)
Opcode.Name: ps_div

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Multiply-Add frD(ps*) = [frA(ps*) * frC(ps*)] + frB(ps*)
Opcode.Name: ps_madd

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Multiply-Add Scalar high frD(ps0) = [frA(ps0) * frC(ps0)] + frB(ps0) frD(ps1) = [frA(ps1) * frC(ps0)] + frB(ps1)
Opcode.Name: ps_madds0

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Multiply-Add Scalar low frD(ps0) = [frA(ps0) * frC(ps1)] + frB(ps0) frD(ps1) = [frA(ps1) * frC(ps1)] + frB(ps1)
Opcode.Name: ps_madds1

Opcode.Description: Paired Single MERGE high frD(ps0) = frA(ps0) frD(ps1) = frB(ps0)
Opcode.Name: ps_merge00

Opcode.Description: Paired Single MERGE direct frD(ps0) = frA(ps0) frD(ps1) = frB(ps1)
Opcode.Name: ps_merge01

Opcode.Description: Paired Single MERGE swapped frD(ps0) = frA(ps1) frD(ps1) = frB(ps0)
Opcode.Name: ps_merge10

Opcode.Description: Paired Single MERGE low frD(ps0) = frA(ps1) frD(ps1) = frB(ps1)
Opcode.Name: ps_merge11

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Move Register frD(ps0) = frB(ps0) frD(ps1) = frB(ps1)
Opcode.Name: ps_mr

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Multiply-Subtract frD(ps0) = [frA(ps0) * frC(ps0)] - frB(ps0) frD(ps1) = [frA(ps1) * frC(ps1)] - frB(ps1)
Opcode.Name: ps_msub

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Multiply frD(ps0) = frA(ps0) * frC(ps0) frD(ps1) = frA(ps1) * frC(ps1)
Opcode.Name: ps_mul

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Multiply Scalar high frD(ps0) = frA(ps0) * frC(ps0) frD(ps1) = frA(ps1) * frC(ps0)
Opcode.Name: ps_muls0

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Multiply Scalar low frD(ps0) = frA(ps0) * frC(ps1) frD(ps1) = frA(ps1) * frC(ps1)
Opcode.Name: ps_muls1

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Negative Absolute Value frD(ps0) =-fabs(frB(ps0)) frD(ps1) =-fabs(frB(ps1))
Opcode.Name: ps_nabs

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Negate frD(ps0) =-frB(ps0) frD(ps1) =-frB(ps1)
Opcode.Name: ps_neg

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Negative Multiply-Add frD(ps0) = -[frA(ps0) * frC(ps0) + frB(ps0) ] frD(ps1) = -[frA(ps1) * frC(ps1) + frB(ps1) ]
Opcode.Name: ps_nmadd

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Negative Multiply-Subtract frD(ps0) = -[frA(ps0) * frC(ps0) - frB(ps0) ] frD(ps1) = -[frA(ps1) * frC(ps1) - frB(ps1) ]
Opcode.Name: ps_nmsub

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Reciprocal Estimate frD(ps0) = estimate(1/frB(ps0)) frD(ps1) = estimate(1/frB(ps1))
Opcode.Name: ps_res

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Reciprocal Estimate frD(ps0) = estimate(1/sqrt(frB(ps0))) frD(ps1) = estimate(1/sqrt(frB(ps1)))
Opcode.Name: ps_rsqrte

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Select frD(ps*)=frA(ps*)>=0?frC(ps*):frB(ps*)
Opcode.Name: ps_sel

Opcode.Description: Paired Single Subtract frD(ps0) = frA(ps0) - frB(ps0) frD(ps1) = frA(ps1) - frB(ps1)
Opcode.Name: ps_sub

Opcode.Description: Paired Single vector SUM high frD(ps0) = frA(ps0) + frB(ps1) frD(ps1) = frC(ps1)
Opcode.Name: ps_sum0

Opcode.Description: Paired Single vector SUM low frD(ps0) = frC(ps0) frD(ps1) = frA(ps0) + frB(ps1)
Opcode.Name: ps_sum1

Opcode.Description: Subtract From rD = ~ (rA) + (rB) + 1
Opcode.Name: subfx

Opcode.Description: Subtract from Extended rD = ~ (rA) + (rB) + XER[CA]

Opcode.Description: Subtract from Minus One Extended rD = ~ (rA) + XER[CA] â€“ 1
Opcode.Name: subfmex

Opcode.Description: Translation Lookaside Buffer Invalidate Entry
